Title: Einhell TC-SM 2531/2 U Sliding Mitre Saw 254mm Single Bevel + Stand 1900W
Description:
The Einhell TC-SM 2531/2 U sliding mitre saw combines user-friendliness with precision on crosscuts and mitre cuts in workpieces made of wood, laminated panels and plastics. The high-quality turntable comes with an exact angle adjustment facility that can be latched single handedly in various positions. With a saw head that tilts to the left, the TC-SM 2531/2 U allows more complex cuts to be made at a wide range of angles. Supports for the sawing of long workpieces and the solid design of the clamping device ensure that the workpiece is held securely in position.

The TC-SM 2531/2 U comes with its own stand so it can be used at a comfortable standing height. A 48 tooth blade is also included, along with a dust bag.
